preamble.context: Batch 1-2 (Runs 1-200) established stability baseline. Retrieval Discipline remained static at 0.4545. Infrastructure deployed but not activated. Batch 3 marks transition from STABILITY to ADAPTIVITY.
preamble.problem_statement: Without volatility-aware learning rates, the system cannot distinguish between regimes where aggressive adaptation is beneficial vs. harmful.
preamble.strategic_intent: Maximize Freedom Score = (Alpha Signal Precision) / (Time Investment) by enabling autonomous adaptation within governance-controlled bounds.

section_1_volatility_adjusted_safe_bound.description: Dynamic adjustment limits based on IoS-003 regime volatility quartiles

Q1_LOW.rationale: Low volatility = high overfitting risk. Conservative adjustments only.

Q2_Q3_MEDIUM.rationale: Standard operating range. Original CEO-DIR-007 bounds apply.

Q4_HIGH.rationale: High volatility = rapid pattern emergence. Aggressive adaptation permitted.

EXTREME_DEFCON.rationale: ADR-016 Circuit Breaker. No autonomous changes during crisis.

section_2_path_euthanasia_protocol.description: Mechanism for quarantining and eventually eliminating low-yield ontology paths

QUARANTINE.action: Path excluded from retrieval, logged for review

EUTHANASIA.criteria: Quarantined path shows no recovery potential after human review
EUTHANASIA.action: Permanent deletion from fhq_graph active set

section_2_path_euthanasia_protocol.governance_constraint: Append-only audit trail. Even 'deleted' paths remain in historical tables per ADR-020 APPEND_ONLY invariant.

section_3_stop_loss_mechanism.description: Circuit breaker for learning loop if improvements fail to materialize

section_4_delegation_of_authority.description: CEO delegates operational adjustment authority to enable autonomous operation

cseo_authority.scope: All weight adjustments within current volatility quartile bounds
cseo_authority.limit: No single adjustment may exceed Â±20% without VEGA attestation
cseo_authority.override: CEO may revoke at any time

vega_authority.scope: Attestation of adjustments exceeding CSEO limits
vega_authority.veto_power: May block any adjustment that violates Strategic Constitution
vega_authority.escalation: Class A violations escalate immediately to CEO

ceo_intervention_triggers: Cumulative cost exceeds daily budget by >50%

components.alpha_signal_precision: Golden needles promoted / Total G0 proposals
components.time_investment: CEO hours spent on system oversight (target: minimize)

section_5_freedom_score_kpi.success_metric: Freedom Score > 10 (meaning 10x more alpha per hour of oversight)

closing_statement.mantra: Stability was Phase 1. Adaptivity is Phase 2. Freedom is the destination.
closing_statement.commitment: The system will learn autonomously within bounds. The CEO will be notified only when it matters.
